pkgmetadata.longdescription: pyenv=====pyenv lets you easily switch between multiple versions of Python. It's simple, unobtrusive, and follows the UNIX tradition of single-purpose tools that do one thing well.**NOTE:** This is a placeholder package. pyenv is a collection of shell scripts and not installable with pip.See `installation instructions <https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv#installation>`_ for more information.
